comments:
In the Metadata Repositories tab of the new UI you can remove the repositories by hitting the X button but it won't let you remove all of them. When you get to the last one, it remains in the list. You get the following stack trace in the log file:



!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2007-08-02 12:29:58.494
